name: VIVOHOME Food Dehydrator Machine, Dehydrator for Food and Jerky, Fruits, Meat, 5 Trays Electric Dryer Dehydrator with 72H Digital Timer and Temperature Control for Veggies, Herbs, Mushroom, Dog Treats
about_this_item: HIGH PERFORMANCE: The VIVOHOME Food Dehydrator operates with a powerful motor that ensures efficient drying; With a built-in hot air fan, the dehydrator features a 360¬∞ air circulation system, promoting even drying without the need for rotating trays; The adjustable temperature ranges from 95 ‚Ñâ to 158 ‚Ñâ, allowing you to dry a variety of foods perfectly; The transparent design allows you to monitor the drying process without opening the unit

LARGE CAPACITY: Equipped with 5 removable and stackable trays, this dehydrator provides ample space for drying large quantities of food at once; Each tray is designed with a spacious 10.3 x 9.5 in surface, accommodating a wide range of foods; The two stacking options allow you to customize different pallet spacing (0.83 in & 1.2 in) based on the food being dehydrated

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: The VIVOHOME Food Dehydrator features a digital control panel with an easy-to-read LED screen, simplifying the process of setting time and temperature; The timer can be set up to 72 hours, providing flexibility for various drying tasks; The trays are dishwasher safe, making cleanup quick and hassle-free

SAFETY AND RELIABILITY: The food dehydrator is designed with an overheat protection system, which will automatically switch on and off to prevent overheating; The non-slip feet keep the dehydrator stable during operation, preventing any accidents; The trays are BPA-free, ensuring the safety of your dried foods; The stainless steel construction and ABS materials allows for long-lasting performance

MULTIFUNCTIONAL USES: This dehydrator is perfect for creating healthy snacks such as dried fruits, jerky, and vegetable chips, preserving herbs and flowers, and even making pet treats; The adjustable trays can accommodate different food thicknesses, offering versatility in food preparation; The consistent drying performance helps retain the natural flavors and nutrients of the food; The quiet operation ensures it won't disturb your household activities

title: Best Beef Jerky Machine
content: This thing is great and does exactly what I got it for: Making awesome beef jerky at home for a fraction of what the store bought stuff costs.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: I was warned away from these types of dehydrators because they often don't have temperature settings but this little guy does, and while it's not a huge range, it has the more important temps for dehydrating foods from "slow and low" to surprisingly high.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2024

I made some veggies, apples, and peaches. So far they have loved everything I‚Äôve made ! The apples I made, they ate like chips ! Very satisfied with the product.

title: Verified Purchase

title: Compact and easy to use !
content: Love this. Holding up pretty well, just wish I got the bigger one. You can always take treys off. Can‚Äôt add treys you don‚Äôt have. I make beef jerky on this. It takes about 5 hours on max temp depending on the thickness. Delicious. Even dehydrating. Does it‚Äôs job. Easy to clean, love that it compact and just plugs into the wall.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: Spent extra on this for the stainless steel base and initially was kicking myself for not getting the extra 3 trays.  The product has solid build quality, stainless steel base, good controls, etc.  BUT the trays of fruit I put on the top don't dry at nearly the same rate as the ones on the bottom.  I spaced out my apple slices an appropriate amount but after the timer went off the apples on the bottom tray were becoming dry and brittle while the ones on the top, or 5th tray, were still soft and juicy inside.  I've dried about 5 batches of fruit and always had the same result.  This is not powerful enough for the extra trays.  It's not really powerful enough to consistently heat the 5 trays it comes with.  I was hoping to make beef jerky with this also but doubt its powerful enough to consistently heat it all.  I recommend checking out other dehydrators and making sure they don't suffer the same issue.  It's a shame because the build quality and aesthetics are otherwise great.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020

title: Get the bigger one!
content: This unit works great I would highly recommend it to any one looking for a good Dehydrator its worth the money you won't be disappointed its easy to program the temp and time is's really easy to clean I have ran 5 batches of beef jerky no problem it always starts not like other units that you use one or two times and won't come on again I am really satisfied with this product I would give it a 10 on a 1 to 10 rating.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: Simple to use dehydrator with adjustable temperature control and programable timer. Fits together to store in a more low profile way. Doesn't come with tray inserts or mat. Also the temperatures are already programed so spinning the knob only picks between the pre-set temps. About 10 degrees between each step.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021

title: Great build quality BUT doesn't get warm enough for top trays.
content: This machine surprised me as it worked better than I thought is would.  Has much more potential than advertised.  I use it to dry fruits for cocktails and I was able to dip my fruit in simple syrup, tapped dry, make sure they're not dripping, and dried them.  They came out vibrant in color and had a great taste.

title: Works great

title: Verified Purchase
content: It dries well enough, and holds a decent amount, but it can't handle very wet foods, because the center hole makes lining with plastic difficult without leaks.  Which would be fine except everything leaks all the way down and the base is impossible to get clean- the motor cover does not come off and nothing diverts all the little drips and bits from getting in- once a cycle is complete, it's stuck on really, really well, and you can't use water or soap, you just have to scrape and pick at it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020

title: Pretty nice machine
